CompletedMissions.subtitle: Master Every Mission, Earn Your Victory!

steps.title: Select and Understand Your Mission
steps.description: Browse through your mission list, choose a mission, and click on "More Details" to read the requirements and tasks needed to complete it.

steps.title: Verify Your Mission Completion
steps.description: After completing the required tasks, go back to the mission's card and click on "Check Completion" to verify if you've met all the criteria.

steps.title: Earn Points and Track Progress
steps.description: If the mission is successfully completed, you will see the amount of points earned. and your completed mission will be marked in the gamification tab.
